description: The Sculk Transmitter sculk transmitter is an item used to link to certain blocks.

Sculk transmitters can be linked to shulker boxes, anvils, crafting tables, stonecutters, cartography tables, smithing tables, grindstones, looms, furnaces, smokers, blast furnaces, enchanting tables, brewing stands, beacons, chests, barrels, dispensers, droppers, hoppers and trapped chests.

To link the sculk transmitter to a block, use it on the block while sneaking. To open the block's interface, you can simply use the transmitter without sneaking. To unlink the sculk transmitter, use it while sneaking.
